original: Sā taṇhā buddhassa bhagavato chinnā ucchinnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā.

i t ca ati pada sandhi pe

original: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ.

original: Oghatiṇṇanti bhagavā kāmoghaṁ tiṇṇo bhavoghaṁ tiṇṇo diṭṭhoghaṁ tiṇṇo avijjoghaṁ tiṇṇo sabbasaṁsārapathaṁ tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivatto.

original: So vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātimaraṇasaṁsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti—

original: Abhiyāceti yācāmi abhiyācāmi ajjhesāmi sādiyāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi jappāmi abhijappāmi.
